snippet: While the Mannings are the 21st century’s first family of quarterbacks, it is remarkable how dissimilar Peyton and his brother Eli approach the position than their father, Archie, did.
abstract: Peyton and Eli Manning are the 21st century’s first family of NFL quarterbacks, but it is remarkable how dissimilar the brothers approach the position than their father Archie did.
lead_paragraph: While the Mannings are the 21st century’s first family of quarterbacks, it is remarkable how dissimilar Peyton and his brother Eli approach the position than their father, Archie, did.

headline.seo: Mannings Draw Inspiration From Father, but Find Success With Arms
headline.main: Mannings Follow Father, but Not in His Footsteps
headline.print_headline: Mannings Follow Father, But Not in His Footsteps
